input.sentences: the whole family is attending the graduation ceremony .
this young man is very proud of his accomplishments .
he and his sister are smiling for the camera and the photo album .
the boy 's mother and grandmother are so pleased to be there with him .
these boys are happy to celebrate this day together .
output.sentences: My family attended my graduation ceremony.
I loved smiling and taking photos with my sister.
My mother and grandmother were pleased at everything I accomplished.
It was such a happy day to celebrate.
